sentences.en: A rabbit's large ears enable it to hear the slightest sound.
sentences.cn: 兔子耳朵大能听到极微小的声音.

sentences.en: Biomedical research will enable many individuals infected with HIV to live longer, more comfortable lives.
sentences.cn: 生物医学研究将会使许多艾滋病患者延长生命、提高生命质量。

sentences.en: But scientific method does enable large numbers to walk with surer steps.
sentences.cn: 但是,科学方法的确使许多人前进的步伐更有把握.

sentences.en: The function of the stomach is to digest food sufficiently to enable it to pass into the intestine.
sentences.cn: 胃的功能是充分消化食物,以便让其进入肠道.

sentences.en: The interests he is most likely to enjoy will be those which enable him to show off himself or his talents.
sentences.cn: 他最有可能感兴趣的就是那些能让他表现自己或炫耀才华的事情。

sentences.en: The King was on a private visit to enable him to pray at the tombs of his ancestors.
sentences.cn: 国王以私人身份出访，以便能够祭拜先祖陵墓。

sentences.en: The measures will enable us to double our output of bicycles.
sentences.cn: 这些措施能使我们的自行车产量加倍.

sentences.en: The new test should enable doctors to detect the disease early.
sentences.cn: 新的检测手段应该能够使医生们尽早查出这种疾病。

sentences.en: The sessions will enable you to discuss problems with fellow asthma sufferers.
sentences.cn: 这些环节让你和其他哮喘病患者一起讨论问题.

sentences.en: The shell has to be slightly porous to enable oxygen to pass in.
sentences.cn: 外壳不得不有些细小的孔以便能使氧气通过.

sentences.en: They transplant tendinous tissue to enable the crippled to walk.
sentences.cn: 他们通过移植腱组织使跛足的人能行走。

sentences.en: This bird's wings enable it to fly very fast.
sentences.cn: 这只鸟强劲的双翼使它能够飞得很快.

sentences.en: This dictionary will enable better international understanding.
sentences.cn: 这部辞典将促进国际间更好的理解.

sentences.en: This is but a foretaste of what the emerging technologies will enable us to do.
sentences.cn: 新科技将会给我们带来什么，这仅仅是一次初体验。

sentences.en: This will enable the audience to sit in comfort while watching the shows.
sentences.cn: 这样能够让观众舒舒服服地坐着看表演。

words.tran_cn: 使能够；授权给（enable的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: to make it possible for someone to do something, or for something to happen

trans.tran_cn: 使能够， 使可能， 使可行
trans.tran_en: to make it possible for someone to do something, or for something to happen
